pageTitle: Srigee DLM IPO Date, Price, GMP, Review, Analysis & Details
pageHeading: Srigee DLM Limited IPO (Srigee DLM IPO) Detail

lotSize.summary: Investors can bid for a minimum of 1200 shares and in multiples thereof. The following table depicts the minimum and maximum investment by Retail Investors and HNI in terms of shares and amount.

promoterHolding.promoters: Mr. Shashi Kant Singh and Mrs. Suchitra Singh are the company promoters.
promoterHolding.note: The value will be calculated using Equity Dilution = Share Holding Pre Issue - Share Holding Post Issue

about.details:
Incorporated in December 20, 2005, as Srigee Enterprises Private Limited, Srigee DLM Private Limited began with plastic mouldings for consumer durables. By 2013, Srigee DLM Private Limited diversified into home appliance mouldings and boosted its capacity by adding advanced injection molding machines.

Srigee DLM Private Limited is engaged in design-led manufacturing and assembly services, specializing in plastic injection moulding, tool room & die manufacturing, mobile phone sub-assembly, and polymer compounding & trading.

The company caters to industries like consumer durables, home appliances, automotive components, and electronics by delivering high-quality, cost-efficient, and reliable manufacturing solutions to leading OEMs.

Business Verticals:

  • Plastic Injection Moulding & Assembly
  • Tool Room & Die Manufacturing
  • Cellular Phone Assembly & Moulding
  • Polymer Compounding & Trading

Focused on quality, timely delivery, and cost efficiency, Srigee DLM Private Limited has built lasting relationships with OEM leaders like Symphony Limited, Starion, Dipty Lal Judge Mal Pvt. Ltd. (DLJM), and Syntyche Tradex Enterprises.

Srigee DLM Private Limited is also expanding its footprint with a new facility at Ecotech-10, Greater Noida, focused on electronics, electrical assembly, and advanced plastic moulding.

As of January 31, 2025, the company has 61 permanent employees.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Strong relationships with established customer base, with potential to expand the customer base.
  • Experienced promoter and management
  • End-to-end solutions provider with a dedicated design and development team
  • Flexible and cost-effective manufacturing capabilities

contactDetails.full_address: Srigee DLM Limited, Plot No. 434, Udyog Kendra 2 Ecotech 3, Greater Noida

faqs.question: What is the Srigee DLM IPO?
faqs.answer:
Srigee DLM IPO is a SME IPO of 1714800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹16.98 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹99 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on May 5, 2025, and closes on May 7, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Srigee DLM IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Srigee DLM IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Srigee DLM IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Srigee DLM IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Srigee DLM IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Srigee DLM IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Srigee DLM IPO opens on May 5, 2025 and closes on May 7, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Srigee DLM IPO?
faqs.answer: Srigee DLM IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,18,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Srigee DLM IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Srigee DLM IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Srigee DLM IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Srigee DLM IPO will be done on Thursday, May 8, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, May 9, 2025. Check the Srigee DLM IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Srigee DLM IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Srigee DLM IPO listing date is on Monday, May 12, 2025.

reservation.summary: Srigee DLM IPO offers total 1714800 shares. Out of which 325200 (18.96%) allocated to QIB 246000 (14.35%) allocated to NII 572400 (33.38%) allocated to RII and 484800 (28.27%) allocated to Anchor investors.
